Html:
Sorry if this has been asked or answered somewhere else, I tried searching for it but I am unable to find the specific answer.

This might apply to other models, but I am using the Healadin model. I currently have several items equipped that aren't showing up in the comparisons window. Specifically, I have the Headdress of the High Potentate from Karazhan. I do have a few other pieces that aren't showing up in the window either.

I can see the "Fight HPS" for the item when I chart my current gear, but not when I chart the "Gear>Head"

I have edited the pieces in the Comparisons window, and the only way I can get it to show up there is to duplicate the item, then change the item type into "Plate". Is there an easier way to do this? If so, I'd like to know :)

Yeah, the currently released version of the healadin model filters out cloth from being visible. We're changing that in the next version. In the mean time, yeah, just right click, edit, change it to plate.
